name: Ice Willow
description: The Ice Willow is a large plant creature resembling an ice-covered willow tree, capable of blending into its environment and deceiving foes until threatened.
memorable: It can deal significant cold damage while remaining hidden until it attacks, utilizing icy abilities to control the battlefield.
goals: To ambush adventurers and control its environment using chilling attacks.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other plant creatures or in icy environments.
environment: Typically found in cold, icy environments.
strengths: Immunities to cold damage and high hit points provide durability in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to fire damage, making it susceptible to certain attacks.
attacks: Can perform two Slam attacks dealing bludgeoning and cold damage, along with powerful area attacks like Icicle Drop and Icicle Spray.
most_powerful_ability: The Icicle Spray, which affects a large area, dealing substantial piercing and cold damage to multiple targets.
senses: Has a passive perception of 12, allowing it to spot foes slightly better than average.
skills: Possesses a +2 bonus to perception, aiding in its ability to notice adventurers nearby.
additional_information: Has a False Appearance trait that allows it to disguise itself effectively.
Ice Melt ability enhances its defense by giving advantage on saving throws against its attacks.
Can counterattack immediately with Icicle Drop when it receives fire damage.
test_queries: plant monster that blends into ice
monster that attacks with cold and ice
large creature with freezing icicle abilities
